price: (33) Such is the punishment [of this world]. And the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡعَذَابُۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: kadhālika al-ʿadhābu walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati akbaru law kānū yaʿlamūna
